ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Rejoice all ye Hybrids
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh!  You must have read Kelijimmiehat (or whatever the hell his name is) s posts about how this is really a nerf no matter how many different folks tried to
ygData.messageBody:
Heh! You must have read Kelijimmiehat (or whatever the hell his name is)'s
posts about how this is really a nerf no matter how many different folks
tried to explain it. ;o)

-=B=-
----- Original Message -----
From: "Jeffrey Sue" <jsue@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, January 15, 2001 12:35 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rejoice all ye Hybrids


> heh sorry, too used to the concert hall where the first thing people do is
whine
> and complain before they actually take the time to read and understand
what's
> been really said.
>
> At 12:52 PM 1/15/01 -0500, you wrote:
> >Whoa...easy there. Heh...the guy just caught something out of context,
or
> >misread it, and thought the worst for a moment. It's great you wanna
help
> >set him straight, but lets not turn this into the everquest.com message
> >boards.
